1100010011100100 0110100100010000 0 -> sum: 0010110111110100, cout: 1
1010111011010011 1011101101011011 1 -> sum: 0110101000101111, cout: 1

0010111111101000 0111000010110100 0 -> sum: 1010000010011100, cout: 0
0111101000010010 0110111001010011 1 -> sum: 1110100001100110, cout: 0
1001110110011010 0011001100001010 1 -> sum: 1101000010100101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
